oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Continuous finite-time stabilization of the translational and rotational double integrators
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BHAT, SP
BERNSTEIN, DS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: systems
finite-time stability
non-lipschitzian dynamics
stability
stabilization
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A class of bounded continuous time-invariant finite-time stabilizing feedback laws is given for the double integrator. Lyapunov theory is used to prove finite-time convergence. For the rotational double integrator, these controllers are modified to obtain finite-time-stabilizing feedbacks that avoid "unwinding."
